snippet: The arrest of an aide to Prime Minister David Cameron, who has been accused of cronyism, raises new questions about his appointees.
abstract: British officials say government aide Patrick Rock had resigned from senior post shortly before his February arrest on charges of possessing child pornography; arrest came as blow to Prime Min David Cameron, who has been accused of cronyism in his choice of ministers.
lead_paragraph: The arrest of an aide to Prime Minister David Cameron, who has been accused of cronyism, raises new questions about his appointees.

headline.main: British Official’s Arrest a Blow to Cameron Government
headline.print_headline: Britain: Officials Confirm Resignation of Aide Involved in Online Anti-Pornography Effort
